mapper.select: select count(*) from s_group where status = 'Y'

SELECT sg.group_no, sg.img, sg.title, sg.user_no, m.nickname, sg.location, sg.me_total, sg.me_count, TO_CHAR(sg.gr_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS gr_date FROM s_group sg JOIN member m on m.user_no = sg.user_no WHERE sg.status = 'Y' ORDER BY sg.group_no DESC

SELECT sg.group_no, sg.img, sg.title, sg.content, m.nickname, sg.location, sg.me_total, sg.me_count, TO_CHAR(sg.gr_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS gr_date FROM s_group sg JOIN member m ON m.user_no = sg.user_no WHERE sg.group_no = #{boardNo} ORDER BY sg.group_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_group ( group_no, title, img, content, me_total, location, gr_date, user_no, create_date, status, board_type ) VALUES ( seq_sgr.nextval, #{title}, #{img}, #{content}, #{meTotal}, #{location}, #{grDate}, 1, sysdate, 'Y', 3 )
